transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Shivendra sir good afternoon.
Customer: Good afternoon.
Executive: Good afternoon. Hello. Numan baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Kaun bol raha hai?
Executive: Numan baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Theek hai sir ji.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Haan haan bataiye bataiye.
Executive: Sir woh aapne mail kiya tha na TDS ke liye?
Customer: Achha woh Rajesh bhai ne kiya hoga.
Executive: Haan toh actual mein woh humne apni taraf se process kar diya hai. Toh woh seven working days mein aapke account mein aa jayega. Rajesh bhai ko deta hu.
Customer: Karte hai. Kya keh rahe ho?
Executive: Aapka number Rajesh sir ko deta hu woh aapko call karenge.
Customer: Nahi nahi, maine idhar se process kar diya hai woh saat working days mein aapke account mein aa jayega.
Executive: Kitne working days?
Customer: Seven working days mein.
Executive: Seven working days?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Okay okay koi baat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai toh yeh jo tension aapka khula tha toh mein ise close kar de raha hu. Aapke paas ek feedback aayega toh use please de dijiyega sir.
Customer: Theek hai koi baat nahi.
Executive: Theek mera feedback aayega aapke paas abhi toh aap use de dijiyega please.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sure. Okay sir okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer enquired about TDS refund status.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund processed, credited in 7 days.

- Executive will close the open ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will provide feedback.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tds, refund, feedback
